1.title: Census of Israel
1.keyEvent: God commands Moses to number the Israelite men

2.title: Tribal Arrangement
2.keyEvent: Arrangement of the tribes around the Tabernacle

3.title: Levites Appointed
3.keyEvent: Levites set apart for priestly duties

4.title: Levite Duties
4.keyEvent: Responsibilities of Kohath, Gershon, and Merari families

5.title: Purity and Restitution
5.keyEvent: Laws on unclean persons and restitution for wrongs

7.title: Offerings of Princes
7.keyEvent: Tribal leaders present offerings for dedication

8.title: Consecration of Levites
8.keyEvent: Levites purified and dedicated to service

9.title: Passover Observed
9.keyEvent: Israelites keep Passover in the wilderness

10.title: Silver Trumpets
10.keyEvent: Trumpets used to signal movement and assembly

11.title: Complaints and Quail
11.keyEvent: People complain; God provides quail and judgment

12.title: Miriam and Aaron Rebuked
12.keyEvent: God punishes Miriam for opposing Moses

13.title: Spies Sent
13.keyEvent: Twelve spies explore Canaan and report

14.title: Rebellion and Judgment
14.keyEvent: Israel rebels; God decrees wilderness wandering

15.title: Offerings and Laws
15.keyEvent: Instructions on offerings and Sabbath violation penalty

16.title: Korah's Rebellion
16.keyEvent: Korah and followers rebel; God punishes them

17.title: Aaron's Rod Buds
17.keyEvent: God confirms Aaron's priesthood with budding rod

18.title: Priestly Duties
18.keyEvent: Roles and provisions for priests and Levites

20.title: Water from the Rock
20.keyEvent: Moses strikes rock; Miriam dies; Edom refused passage

21.title: Victories and Serpents
21.keyEvent: Israel defeats enemies; bronze serpent made

23.title: Balaam's First Oracles
23.keyEvent: Balaam blesses Israel instead of cursing

25.title: Idolatry and Plague
25.keyEvent: Israelites sin with Moabites; plague punished

26.title: Second Census
26.keyEvent: New census of Israelite men for inheritance

27.title: Inheritance Laws
27.keyEvent: Daughters of Zelophehad inherit; Joshua appointed

28.title: Sacrificial Offerings
28.keyEvent: Daily, Sabbath, and festival offerings prescribed

29.title: Feast of Tabernacles
29.keyEvent: Detailed offerings for the Feast of Tabernacles

30.title: Vows and Oaths
30.keyEvent: Laws regarding vows made by men and women

32.title: Reuben and Gad's Request
32.keyEvent: Tribes request land east of Jordan

34.title: Land Boundaries
34.keyEvent: God defines borders of the Promised Land

35.title: Cities of Refuge
35.keyEvent: Cities for manslayers and Levite towns assigned

36.title: Inheritance for Zelophehad's Daughters
36.keyEvent: Marriage laws to preserve tribal inheritance
